hero.title: Welcome to BetterLB
hero.subtitle: The volunteer run portal of the Municipality of Los Ba√±os. Find information, access government services, stay updated with the latest news about Los Ba√±os.

services.title: Popular Services
services.description: Access official government services quickly and easily. Find what you need for citizenship, business, education, and more.

joinUs.stripSubtitle: Help build the future of the Philippines and governance through technology
joinUs.bannerSubtitle: Help build the future of the Philippines and governance through technology.

data.title: Real-Time Data Services
data.description: Access up-to-date information on weather conditions and foreign exchange rates across the Philippines.
data.weatherDescription: Get current weather conditions and forecasts for major cities across the Philippines. Plan your day with accurate temperature readings and weather alerts.
data.forexDescription: Track foreign exchange rates from Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP). Convert currencies and view historical rate trends for major world currencies.

promotion.philsysDescription: Register for your Philippine Identification System (PhilSys) ID card today. The national ID serves as a single government-issued identification document for all citizens.

government.title: Local Government of the Municipality of Los Ba√±os
government.description: Learn about the key offices, councils, and local units that make up the Municipal Government of Los Ba√±os.
government.executiveDescription: Led by the Mayor, responsible for implementing municipal policies, programs, and ordinances.
government.legislativeDescription: Composed of the Sangguniang Bayan, responsible for making local laws.
government.barangaysDescription: Local government units within the municipality, led by elected officials who manage community-level services and programs.
government.departmentsDescription: Municipal departments and agencies responsible for specific areas of governance.
government.directoryDescription: Find contact information for government officials, agencies, and offices at national and local levels.
